title: Les Interprètes - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Drama   College/University   Female Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Wealthy Characters
author: Miao Juan   缪娟
description: A drama that tells of the story between a university student majoring in French studies, and a professional interpreter. Though they start off on the wrong foot, it eventually develops into romantic relationship.>
